name: FormData
description: The FormData interface provides a way to easily construct a set of key/value pairs representing form fields and their values, which can then be easily sent using the XMLHttpRequest.send() method. It uses the same format a form would use if the encoding type were set to "multipart/form-data".

refs.name: XMLHttpRequest
refs.description: The definition of 'FormData' in the 'XMLHttpRequest' specification.
